title: SENATUS POPULUSQ[...]
COS SEPT DESIGNAT OCTAVOM V[...]IA [...]S
CELEBERRIMEIS ITALIAE VIEIS CONSILIO [...]US [...]NITEIS
transcription: co(n)s(uli) sept(imo) designat(o) octavom v[ia Flamin]ia [et reliquei]s
celeberrimeis Italiae vieis consilio [et sumptib]us [eius mu]niteis
translation: The Senate and People of Rome (gave this arch)
to Imperator Caesar Augustus, son of the divine Julius, Imperator seven times,
Consul seven times and consul-elect for an eighth time, for the via Flaminia
and the other very distinguished roads of Italy too which have been repaired by his auctoritas.

bibliographies.citation: De Maria Sandro. 1988. Gli archi onorari di Roma e dell'Italia romana, Roma
Susini Giancarlo. 1999. L'arco d'Augusto tra storia antica e nuove scoperte, Rimini.
